title: REPEAT OR EVLOVE
itunes:title: REPEAT OR EVLOVE
itunes:subtitle: Motiversity
description:
Every morning we are faced with two decisions: REPEAT OR EVOLVE. Which path will you pick today? One of the Best Motivational Speeches and our latest release with Cole "The Wolf" DaSilva (https://bit.ly/ColeDaSilvaMotiversity).


Music by Really Slow Motion (https://bit.ly/RSMMusic).




Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
